thread.title: Trivendra Singh Rawat's swearing-in today : Trivendra Singh Yadav to take oath as Uttarakhand CM shortly. Outgoing CM Harish Rawat also present - The Times of India
thread.title_full: Trivendra Singh Rawat's swearing-in today : Trivendra Singh Yadav to take oath as Uttarakhand CM shortly. Outgoing CM Harish Rawat also present - The Times of India

author: Venkaiah Naidu On Up Cm
title: Trivendra Singh Rawat's swearing-in today : Trivendra Singh Yadav to take oath as Uttarakhand CM shortly. Outgoing CM Harish Rawat also present - The Times of India
text:
Ooops.. At least one check box should be ticked. FILTER UPDATES Text and Social Videos 02:54 PM (IST) Trivendra Singh Yadav to take oath as Uttarakhand CM shortly. Outgoing CM Harish Rawat also present Trivendra Singh Rawat to take oath as Uttarakhand Chief Minister shortly, Harish Rawat also present. pic.twitter.com/z6E9wWGgXt â€” ANI (@ANI_news) March 18, 2017 02:49 PM (IST) Meanwhile, union minister Manoj Sinha, among UP CM probables, leaves for Lucknow from Varanasi instead of going to Delhi 02:31 PM (IST) PM Modi reaches Dehradun Uttarakhand: PM Modi arrives in Dehradun; will attend swearing in ceremony of CM designate Trivendra Singh Rawat later pic.twitter.com/6snMdoDLjw & amp;mdash; ANI (@ANI_news) March 18, 2017 01:15 PM (IST) Prakash Pant, Madan Kaushik, Yashpal Arya, Subodh Uniyal and Rekha Arya among MLAs who will take oath as ministers today along with Trivendra Singh Yadav 01:13 PM (IST) Meanwhile, supporters of Adityanath demonstrate in Lucknow demanding that he should be made Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh 09:53 AM (IST) Names in news reports are pure speculative, today evening we will be meeting the MLAs and then decide Venkaiah Naidu on UP CM 08:17 AM (IST) Will provide opportunities that help people of Uttarakhand to grow: Trivendra Singh Rawat 
An upbeat Trivendra Singh Rawat, soon after being elected as leader of the BJP legislature party and CM-designate of Uttarakhand, spoke with TOI about his priorities for the state and how he plans to implement the promises made by PM Modi 08:15 AM (IST) 
His loyalty to the party and RSS ideology possibly gave him an edge in the race to the top job in Uttarakhand 08:13 AM (IST) 
Rawat, a Thakur leader, was among the frontrunners for Uttarakhand CM's post in part due to his strong RSS roots. He was an RSS pracharak from 1983 to 2002 and held several important positions in the Sangh. From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
